ProductInfo.Features:
HD 720P resolution MegaPixels CMOS sensor camera, H.264/MJPEG compression, easy to setup, user friendly.
3.6mm lens, 10pcs 850nm Infrared lights. Built in IR-CUT, no color cast in day, clearer images at night. Support remote to pan and tilt (pan : 270 degree, tilt: 120 degree).
Support Motion Detection. Giving alarm in cause of motion detection. Two-way audio monitoring, built-in microphone. Support P2P, remote viewing & record from anywhere anytime. SD card (up to 32G) recording (NOT included).
Support iPhone, Windows Mobile, Android phone viewing. Support IE, Firefox, Safari, Chrome and Opera. Multi-level users management with password protection.
Support TCP/IP network protocol and built-in web server, easy to network setting. Wifi compliant with wireless standards IEEE 802.11b/g/n.
ProductInfo.Name: Gadget Zone HS-YXY-0073A Wireless Security Camera Night Vision HD 720P H.264 Security IP Camera IR-Cut P2P, Mega Pixels CMOS Sensor, 3.6mm Lens, Pan 270 Degree/Tilt 120 Degree, 10LEDs 5m IR Range, Filp/Mirror Image Rotation, 802.11b/g/n, Mobile Phone View, Built-in Microphone and Dual Way Audio, Motion Detecction, Up to 32G SD Slot, DC 5V 2A Power Supply, Support Internet Explorer6.0 and Above/Safari/Firefox View
